Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2013 02:24PM Jennk711 wrote: hello, Beesie what I meant by later in life is I'm not in my teen years when you usually develop. I didn't know in your twenties you can still be developing. I did tell the breast surgeon and she didn't really say much about if there's any relation with the abortion. I just worry so much because of the one becoming bigger and irritated everyday and sometimes it hurts. When I ask people around me if they ever had this issue they all give me this look of terror and say you better get that looked at. Also my back on that side began hurting a few months later weather it's related to that I'm not sure...it could be my office chair at work and I had severe arm pain on and off for about a year prior to this they think is a pinched nerve. I asked several doctors if that could affect that breast since it's on that side but they didn't seem to think so but my obgyn said it might.

Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2013 05:32PM Jennk711 wrote: I was pregnant in February so for me it's been a while and the symptoms didn't start happening until July. That's why I don't think it's related. During the time I was pregnant my boobs deffinately hurt but never did one get bigger

Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2013 03:11PM Jennk711 wrote: haha thank you finally someone that doesn't think I'm crazy! I would like an MRI but I can't get one until after December because of my schedule. The thought of IBC makes me sick to my stomache. I just want this horrible feeling to go away so I can live my life and not be worried 24/7. I don't know about IBC but I have done some research on it and it's a scary thing. Do you know of anything that may cause one breast to get bigger/swell? Every time I look it up IBC is all that ever comes up :(
Posts.Title: Ibc Jennk711 flash

Posts.Content: Jennk711 wrote: hello I am new here and I'm 22 yrs old I'm looking for Anyone to hear my situation. I can't sleep at night i have been so worried. I noticed about 5 months ago my right breast hurt and felt a little itchy one night and the next day I saw my dr who said it was nothing and did an exam with his hands. Then I noticed that breast now is like a half cup size bigger, and feels heavy to me I went back to that dr multiple times and he gave me a chest x ray and nothing showed then I had an ultra sound.....negative then a mammogram and another ultrasound at the Cleveland clinic and also came up negative I even had a visit with a breast Surgeon. She said she can't see anything she would be worried about. Yet it's still uncomfortable and when I wear my bra it feels the worst not really painful just uncomfortable. No other symptoms but I'm so worried and everyone thinks I'm crazy. I research this everyday and all that comes up with IBC and it makes me cry. The breast surgeon swears it's not that but I still don't have answers. As bad as it is I had an abortion in February I don't think that could affect one breast but I'm not sure please I would really love someone's input. Thank you and God bless Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Ibc Jennk711 flash

Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2013 04:57AM Jennk711 wrote: the reason why there answers never make me feel better is because everytime I research one breast getting bigger later in life with a heavy feeling always comes up as ibc and a lot of articles I've read has said it's usually missed on a mammogram and ultrasound. I really appreciate both of your comments. I'm sorry to hear you (kicks) had to deal with ibc I hope your doing great now.

God bless you I'm so happy for your results have a wonderful Christmas!
